content.name: exp
content.prop: exp x = infsum (from 0) (%n. x ^ n / real_of_nat (fact n))

content.name: cos
content.prop: cos x = infsum (from 0) (λn. if (even n) then (-1) ^ (n DIV 2) * x ^ n / real_of_nat (fact n) else 0)

content.name: sin
prop: (λn. if even n then 0 else (-1) ^ ((n - 1) DIV 2) * x ^ n / real_of_nat (fact n))

content.name: log
content.prop: log y = THE y. exp x = y

content.name: pi
content.prop: pi = THE p. 0 < p & sin p = 0 & (!x. 0 <x & x < p --> neg (sin x = 0))

content.name: atn
content.prop: atn y = THE x. -pi/2 < x & x < pi/2 & tan x =y

content.name: asn
content.prop: asn y = (THE x. -pi / 2 <= x ∧ x <= pi / 2 ∧ sin x = y)

content.name: acs
content.prop: acs y = (THE x. 0 ≤ x ∧ x ≤ pi ∧ cos x = y)
